metadata.name: Hello Monday 01
metadata.description:
The subway is a daily routine for many of us, a moment to unwind and prepare for the day ahead.

“Hello Monday” is a collection that captures the serene moments of people riding the subway on a typical Monday morning.

These series depict various subway riders experiencing a sleepy Monday morning. Some have their eyes closed, while others are lost in thought. 

Each piece is a snapshot of a mundane moment of everyday life, a glimpse into the inner worlds of people on their way to work or school. 

“Hello Monday” invites you to step into the world of the subway rider, to join them on their journey, and to experience their dreams and hopes.

This collection captures the unique energy and personality of the riders, creating a vibrant and dynamic portrait of subway life.

(Sound on)

Year: 2023
Software: Midjourney, After effects, Adobe Photoshop
